ActWitness Protection Program Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Schedule to the Witness Protection Program Act (British Columbia Witness Security Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE WITNESS PROTECTION PROGRAM ACT (BRITISH COLUMBIA WITNESS SECURITY PROGRAM) in order to add British Columbia's Witness Security Program to the schedule of the Act as a designated program.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0203 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Schedule to the Witness Protection Program Act (British Columbia Witness Security Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE WITNESS PROTECTION PROGRAM ACT (BRITISH COLUMBIA WITNESS SECURITY PROGRAM) in order to add British Columbia's Witness Security Program to the schedule of the Act as a designated program.
